Hi, new user here, and I was wondering if anyone has experience
interfacing the training of a network generated directly from a
Simulink model in matlab? (the NN will be the function approximator
for a reinforcement learning algorithm, so the "updates" to the value
function will come incrementally over time, the full training set is
not available initially), Anyway, I'm just getting started, so any
ideas would be helpful. 

Thanks,

-Chris
